actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Sem Escamilla Carbajal, his wife, MaElena Villegas de Escamilla, and their children, Berenice Escamilla, Oralia, Noemi Escamilla Villegas, MaElena Escamilla, Elias Roboam, Efrain Josue, Cinda Euridice, Dennis Dean, and Eunice Penelope.
